caption.p: Age comparison between coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and non–COVID-19 delirium patients. The figure shows the distribution of patients' ages in both groups, with no statistically significant difference observed. (A) Age distribution of COVID-19 and non–COVID-19 delirium groups. Median ages and interquartile ranges are similar, with no significant difference observed. (B) Age distribution by sex. Both males and females show comparable median ages and ranges across the groups, with no notable differences.
